revision.text:
{{ZScriptNote}} __NOTOC__
'''[[Structs:Screen|Screen]]'''
native static void '''DrawFrame'''(int x, int y, int w, int h)
== Usage == Draws a frame similar to the one surrounding the edge of the view port. This function is limited as it does not allow for functionality like custom colors or alpha. Coordinates are absolute and start from the top left of the screen with positive x values shifting to the right and positive y values shifting downward.
'''Warning:''' This can only be called from within functions that are specifically designed to draw HUD elements (e.g. BaseStatusBar's [[Draw]] or EventHandler's RenderOverlay).
=== Parameters === *''x'' - The x offset of the top left of the frame *''y'' - The y offset of the top left of the frame *''w'' - The width of the frame *''h'' - The height of the frame
== Examples == {{noexamples}}
[[Category:ZScript]] [[Category:Screen]]
